name: SyncSLATask
description: Enables or disables SLAs based on the PackageDeployer config.
author: capgemini-uk

inputs.name: connectionString
inputs.label: Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: ConnectionString to Dynamics 365 instance. [Microsoft Connection String Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-engagement/developer/xrm-tooling/use-connection-strings-xrm-tooling-connect#create-a-connection-string)

inputs.name: pkgFolderPath
inputs.label: PackageDeployer Pkg Folderpath
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folderpath to the PackageDeployer Pkg folder.

inputs.name: enableSLA
inputs.label: Enable SLAs
inputs.helpMarkDown: If ticked, SLAs will be enabled, if not, SLAs will be disabled.
